# Jobs Internships | AGH Career Center

URL: https://praca.ck.agh.edu.pl/eng
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:07:50

Student and graduate panel

By creating an account, you gain access to:

Individual professional profile

Alerts on offers that meet individual criteria

Job offers, apprenticeships and internships

An extensive database of companies

Module of meetings with a career advisor

Knowledge bases

Why use JobTeaser?

1

Comfort

All you need to build your career (knowledge, information, counselling) on 
one, friendly, free of charge
 on-line platform accessible on you smartphone.

2

Personalization

You will receive information on job offers, events 
according to preferences
 defined in your profile directly on your e-mail box (or by individual browsing).

3

Safety

Your personal data are processed according to RODO standards to facilitate entering the job market and recruitment procedures, access to data is limited to authorised persons only.

4

Variety

You will have access to offers, content and events designated for AGH students/ graduates only, but (if you declare so) to offers and content placed by Job Teaser partner companies from all over Europe.

Employer panel

Employer panel enables for:

Adding and administering company job offers

Managing the candidates applications

Monitoring statistics

Creating company profile (content graphics, video)

Adding events

Possibility of having several administrators

Why use JobTeaser?

1

Employer branding

Information on the company, recruitment policies accessible on the platform (content, graphics, video).

2

Comfort

Time effective, free of charge placing information about events offers and application processing, friendly intuitive platform accessible on your smartphone.

3

Accessibility

Guaranteed content reach to interested candidates (personalised newsletter)

4

Effectiveness

reaching target candidates in the right place at the right time. You will get applications according to needs and expectations. You get access to related statistics.

Page is administered by AGH Career Center
